zi-companies-under-1000-employees-offeri.Name: zi-companies-under-1000-employees-offering-tuition
zi-companies-under-1000-employees-offeri.Description:
The table contains a list of companies with less than 1000 employees that offer tuition assistance as a benefit to their employees. The table includes the following columns:

- Company Name: The name of the company.
- Industry: The industry in which the company operates.
- Location: The location of the company's headquarters.
- Number of Employees: The number of employees at the company.
- Tuition Assistance: A description of the tuition assistance program offered by the company.

zi-companies-with-most-marketing-profess.Name: zi-companies-with-most-marketing-professionals
zi-companies-with-most-marketing-profess.Description:
The table 'zi-companies-with-most-marketing-professionals' contains information about companies with the most marketing professionals. Each row in the table represents a company and includes the following columns:

- Company Name: The name of the company.
- Number of Marketing Professionals: The number of marketing professionals employed by the company.
- Industry: The industry in which the company operates.
- Location: The location of the company's headquarters.
- Founded: The year in which the company was founded.
- Website: The company's website address.

The table is sorted in

ZI_C_LOCATION_ID.Name: ZI_C_LOCATION_ID
ZI_C_LOCATION_ID.Description: ZI_C_LOCATION_ID :  Internal location id from Zippia

ZI_C_COMPANY_ID.Name: ZI_C_COMPANY_ID
ZI_C_COMPANY_ID.Description: ZI_C_COMPANY_ID : Internal company id from Zippia

ZI_C_IS_HQ.Name: ZI_C_IS_HQ
ZI_C_IS_HQ.Description: ZI_C_IS_HQ : Flag to indicate if this is the company HQ location

ZI_ES_ECID.Name: ZI_ES_ECID
ZI_ES_ECID.Description: ZI_ES_ECID : Elastic Search entity Company ID

ZI_C_TIER_GRADE.Name: ZI_C_TIER_GRADE
ZI_C_TIER_GRADE.Description: ZI_C_TIER_GRADE : Zippia custom tier grade for the company

ZI_C_LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE.Name: ZI_C_LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE
ZI_C_LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE.Description: ZI_C_LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE : Legal entity type of the company

ZI_C_STREET.Name: ZI_C_STREET
ZI_C_STREET.Description: ZI_C_STREET : Street address of company HQ

ZI_C_STREET_2.Name: ZI_C_STREET_2
ZI_C_STREET_2.Description: ZI_C_STREET_2 : Street address 2 of company HQ

ZI_C_ZIP.Name: ZI_C_ZIP
ZI_C_ZIP.Description: ZI_C_ZIP : Zip code of company HQ

ZI_C_CBSA_NAME.Name: ZI_C_CBSA_NAME
ZI_C_CBSA_NAME.Description: ZI_C_CBSA_NAME : Core Based Statistical Area (CBSA) name of company HQ

ZI_C_VERIFIED_ADDRESS.Name: ZI_C_VERIFIED_ADDRESS
ZI_C_VERIFIED_ADDRESS.Description: ZI_C_VERIFIED_ADDRESS : Flag indicating if the company HQ address is verified

ZI_C_EMPLOYEE_RANGE.Name: ZI_C_EMPLOYEE_RANGE
ZI_C_EMPLOYEE_RANGE.Description: ZI_C_EMPLOYEE_RANGE : Employee range of the company

ZI_C_REVENUE.Name: ZI_C_REVENUE
ZI_C_REVENUE.Description: ZI_C_REVENUE : Revenue of the company in USD

ZI_C_INDUSTRY_PRIMARY.Description: ZI_C_INDUSTRY_PRIMARY : Primary industry of the company

zi-retail-companies-headquartered-califo.Name: zi-retail-companies-headquartered-california
zi-retail-companies-headquartered-califo.Description: The table 'zi-retail-companies-headquartered-california' contains information about retail companies headquartered in California. Each row in the table represents a different company, and the columns provide information such as the company name, headquarters city, number of employees, and annual revenue. The table is sorted by the number of employees, with the largest companies at the top.
